Reason: The _transientMode configuration option in the prevayler software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly affects system performance. When set to true, it indicates that the system should operate in transient mode, which may lead to increased memory consumption and slower execution time due to the frequent writing of data to disk. On the other hand, setting it to false may improve performance by reducing disk I/O operations and memory usage. Therefore, the value of this configuration option has a notable impact on system performance, making it performance-sensitive.
